original_title: The Cult ‎– Dreamtime Live At The Lyceum
overview: The band performed 15 songs at the concert, which was edited down to nine songs for this release. Originally it came out in the UK as a free album with initial 30,000 copies of the Dreamtime LP and also as side 2 of the Dreamtime cassette. In November 1996, it was remastered, and the full show released on video and CD.  Vinyl bootlegs of this do exist, where the recording has been tested with the original, and is known to be poor.
tagline: The Cult ‎– Dreamtime Live At The Lyceum
title: The Cult ‎– Dreamtime Live At The Lyceum
